tit.j: 三ノ宮神社 (京都市西京区樫原)
tit.e: Sannomiya-jinja Shrine (Katagihara, Saikyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Sannomiya-jinja Shrine (Katagihara, Saikyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Sannomiya-jinja Shrine (Katagihara, Saikyo Ward, Kyoto City)

sen.j: 三ノ宮神社（さんのみやじんじゃ）は、京都市西京区樫原杉原町にある神社である。
sen.e: Sannomiya-jinjya Shrine is a shrine, which is located in Katagihara, Saikyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Sannomiya-jinjya Shrine is a shrine, which is located in Katagihara, Saikyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Sannomiya-jinja Shrine is a shrine, which is located in Katagihara-sugihara-cho, Saikyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Its shrine ranking is a village shrine in the old shrine ranking.
Its shrine ranking is a village shrine in the old shrine ranking.
Its shrine ranking is a village shrine in the old shrine ranking.

sen.j: なお、西京区には三ノ宮神社・三宮神社がいくつかある。
sen.e: There are several shrines named Sannomiya-jinjya Shrines (三ノ宮神社・三宮神社) in Saikyo Ward.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処 *読み方が同じでも、漢字名が違っていたので、漢字名もそのまま残しました。
sen.e: There are several shrines named Sannomiya-jinjya Shrines (三ノ宮神社・三宮神社) in Saikyo Ward.
There are several shrines named Sannomiya-jinja Shrines (三ノ宮神社・三宮神社) in Saikyo Ward.

sen.j: またこの神社の近くには三ノ宮天満宮という神社（境内社）もある。
sen.e: And also, there is a shrine called Sannomiya-tenmangu Shrine (shrine in precincts) near this shrine.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Also, there is a shrine called Sannomiya-tenmangu Shrine (shrine in precincts) near this shrine.
Also, there is a shrine called Sannomiya-tenmangu Shrine (shrine in precincts) near this shrine.

sen.j: この神社の創建年代等については不詳であるが、この神社には平安時代中期の武士源頼光に関連する言い伝えも残されている。
sen.e: Although the year of construction of this shrine and other information have not been unknown, there is a tradition that this shrine is related to a samurai in mid Heian period, MINAMOTO no Yorimitsu.
Although the year of construction of this shrine and other information are unknown, there is a tradition that this shrine is related to the mid Heian period samurai, MINAMOTO no Yorimitsu.
Although the year of construction of this shrine and other information are unknown, there is a tradition that this shrine is related to the mid Heian period samurai, MINAMOTO no Yorimitsu.

sen.j: 京都市西京区樫原杉原町12-1
